price: Wala hatukuwafanya miili isiyo kula chakula, wala hawakuwa wenye kuishi milele.
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ
footnotes: Wala Sisi hatukuwajaalia Mitume kuwa na miili inayo khitalifiana na miili ya wanaadamu wengine, wakawa wanaishi bila ya chakula, na wakabaki siku zote, na wala hawakuwa wanaishi daima milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
